meanings.sent1: The two wheels on the bike were coaxial, spinning perfectly together.
meanings.sent2: The coaxial relationship between the sun and the planets keeps them in orbit.
meanings.sent3: The coaxial twins always dressed alike, much to the amusement of their friends.
meanings.sent4: Their thoughts were coaxial, always aligned and moving in the same direction.
meanings.sent5: The dancers moved in a coaxial pattern, perfectly synchronized and in harmony.

meanings.definition: A cable with a central conductor surrounded by a tubular insulating layer.
meanings.sent1: She connected the TV to the cable box using a coaxial cable.
meanings.sent2: The technician installed a new coaxial cable to improve the internet connection.
meanings.sent3: The magician pulled a never-ending coaxial cable out of his hat, much to the audience's surprise.
meanings.sent4: The coaxial cable acted as a lifeline, connecting the remote village to the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The sound quality improved after switching to a coaxial cable for the speakers.
